sectionText: Topic: Research Design and Methodology: European Union Studies. This seminar introduces students in the Masters in European Union Studies degree program to the processes involved in developing and completing an MA thesis project. Topics covered include qualitative and quantitative research methodologies, library resources in EU studies, conducting effective field research and interviews, on-campus resources for thesis writing, and practical advice on managing a thesis project. As a course requirement, each student will develop a thesis prospectus, to be presented to colleagues at the conclusion of the course. For Graduate credit only.
